The 45-45-90 triangle has angles of 45 degrees, 45 degrees, and 90 degrees, with sides labeled as 'a', 'a', and 'a\u221a2' respectively. The 30-60-90 triangle has angles of 30 degrees, 60 degrees, and 90 degrees, with sides labeled as 'a', 'a\u221a3', and '2a' respectively. The title 'Special Triangles' is at the top of the image."
